words.definition: A piece of clothing worn on the upper part of the body.
words.arabic_definition: قطعة ملابس تُلبس على الجزء العلوي من الجسم.

example.en: He is wearing a blue shirt.

words.definition: Clothing worn on the lower part of the body covering both legs.
words.arabic_definition: ملابس تُلبس على الجزء السفلي من الجسم وتغطي الساقين.

words.definition: A piece of clothing for women or girls that covers the body and extends down over the legs.
words.arabic_definition: قطعة ملابس للنساء أو الفتيات تغطي الجسم وتمتد على الساقين.

words.definition: Footwear worn to protect and comfort the feet.
words.arabic_definition: ما يُلبس في القدمين للحماية والراحة.

words.definition: A measurement of how big or small something is.
words.arabic_definition: قياس مدى كبر أو صغر شيء ما.

words.definition: To put on clothing to see if it fits or looks good.
words.arabic_definition: يلبس قطعة ملابس ليرى إن كانت تناسبه أو جميلة عليه.

example.en: Can I try on this jacket?

words.definition: A short coat worn on the upper body.
words.arabic_definition: معطف قصير يُلبس على الجزء العلوي من الجسم.

words.definition: A size that is little in amount or degree.

example.en: This T-shirt is too small for me.

words.definition: A size that is between small and large.

example.en: Do you have this in medium?

words.definition: A size that is bigger than medium.

example.en: I need a large size jacket.
